text:
model. A single input must have the three-dimensional structure of samples, time steps, and
features, which in this case we only have 1 sample and 1 feature: [1, n input, 1]. If the
diﬀerence operation was performed, we must add back the value that was subtracted after the
model has made a forecast. We must also diﬀerence the historical data prior to formulating the
single input used to make a prediction. The model predict() function below implements this
behavior.
